appDesc.message: Emojis, thumbnails and advanced features for http://tweetdeck.twitter.com !

time_full24.message: Display full date after 24h <small>Applies only for non-relative timestamps</small>

old_replies.message: Revert to the old replies style (pre 03/30/2017)

old_search.message: Revert to the old search system (no columns for searches!)

css_system_fonts.message: Use the system font in the UI

css_show_verified.message: Show 'verified' badges on top of avatars

css_hide_context.message: Hide 'In reply to' label on mentions

css_actions_on_right.message: Show tweet actions on the right

css_show_provider_indicator.message: Show thumbnails' source on top of them

css_hide_like_rt_indicators.message: Hide Like/RT indicators on top of tweets

rtl_text_style.message: Detect and apply RTL style when needed

update_title_on_notifications.message: Display an unread tweets/DMs indicator in TweetDeck's tab's title.

share_btd_p1.message: In order to use the "Share on TweetDeck" feature, you'll need to approve certain permissions which you can do by clicking below

share_btd_p2.message: Better TweetDeck cannot read the content of your tabs and doesn't track it.

share_btd_p3.message: Feel free to read Google's documentation about this permission for more details.

share_btd_p4.message: Any modification on this page will be applied after a browser restart

share_btd_item.message: Add the 'Share on Better TweetDeck' action on contextual menu

share_short_txt.message: Shorten the selected text while using the 'Share on Better TweetDeck' action

no_gif_pp.message: Stop GIFs from playing in avatars

css_no_play_btn.message: Hide the play button on video thumbnails

css_hide_url_thumb.message: Hide the link related to thumbnails in tweets (Ã  la Twitter iOS/Android)

css_small_icns_compose.message: Make buttons smaller in the Compose panel

custom_width_columns.message: Apply a custom width for columns:

regex_filter.message: Enable regular expression support in Mute filters

regex_filter_notice_text.message: Due to the way TweetDeck's filtering works, expressions are NOT case sensitive!

favstar_item.message: Add a "Show in Favstar" item in tweets' menu

mute_hashtags.message: Add shortcuts to mute #hashtags in tweets' menu

hotlink_item.message: Add shortcut to copy the links of all media in a tweet

download_item.message: Add shortcut to download all media of a tweet

download_filename_format_parameters.message: You can use the following variables: {{postedUser}} {{fileName}} {{fileExtension}}

ctrl_changes_interactions.message: Holding <kbd>ctrl</kbd> while clicking: favorite / retweet / download / hotlink will follow the user from the column's owner.

btd_whatsBTD.message: Better TweetDeck is made to improve your experience on tweetdeck.twitter.com!

btd_default.message: The default settings have been applied, feel free to modify them to your liking!

btd_follow.message: You should follow @BetterTDeck on Twitter for support, news and trivia about Better TweetDeck!

donate_title.message: Help me to maintain Better TweetDeck!

donate_p3.message: Thanks a bunch for using Better TweetDeck and helping it live!

donate_p2.message:
If you can afford it and feel generous, it would be wonderful if you could donate on Paypal or support me on Patreon (you can have access to alpha/beta testing of future versions!).

Even the smallest contribution is helping!

donate_p1.message: Better TweetDeck is and always will be free of charge but developing it takes time and keeping it live costs money!

notification_upgrade.message: Better TweetDeck has been upgraded to v{{version}}. Click for more information.
